title: The Jeweler
name: Caspian
summary: The Jeweler, with his keen eye for the lustrous and the rare, operates from the shadows of his modest stall. Twitchy and eager, he seeks more fragments of the cosmic stones that plague the farmstead.
history: A craftsman of once-renowned fame, the Jeweler's life took a stark turn when he unearthed a cosmic stone of undescribale allure, now he sells his hard-collected wares for more.

clothing.top: Dark purple jacket with deep pockets

other_notes: The Jeweler is always on the lookout for more cosmic stones, and will pay handsomely for any that are brought to him.
